about_the_game:
Presentation is key – the new Krachware User Interface Material Variety Pack by Gee Kun Soft will help creators with exactly that when it comes to establishing an all-important menu system for title and loading screens, game over screens and buttons. With over 200 total options to select from including many stylish title screen borders and color options for buttons, this pack will help establish some of the most important features to your game’s interface.

Features:

* titles2 folder: 41 titles 816x624 and 1280x720
* system folder: 106 windowskins, 4 x "Game Over"
* bonus folder: 63 buttons

** Please note that you need the editing software to work with some of the material in "bonus" folder for RPG Makers**

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
